wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Dean Smith or Lilian Gracie Copeman; Margaret Josephine Dean-Smith; Margaret Josephine Dean (7 November 1899 – 9 February 1997) was an English folklorist and librarian.

response: Dances from The Dancing Master were re-published in arrangements by Cecil Sharp in the early 20th century. In 1957 Margaret Dean Smith completed her facsimile book Playford's English Dancing Master.  This work had been the first publication of English dance tunes  and her publication established her as the expert on this work.
*Margaret Dean Smith, 97, English folklorist and librarian.
